title: Sampler
provenance:
By 1981, Gertrude M. Oppenheimer
1981, Cooper-Hewitt Museum
medium:
Medium: wool embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave foundation
description:
Four alphabets, one set of numerals, date and inscription flanked by a cross and chalice, with a floral vine border.
The inscription reads: 
made by Katy aged 9 years
Academy of the Sisters of Notre Dame
name: Sampler
